reporting-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

title.narrative: ICRC operations by the South Sudan Delegation(2021 Unaudited)

description.narrative: The ICRC helps conflict-affected communities in South Sudan become self-sufficient and reunites families. We visit places of detention, support health care facilities, and promote respect for international humanitarian law.Here's the latest news coming out of South Sudan:A South Sudan humanitarian crisisSouth Sudan citiesSouth Sudan newsSouth Sudan womenSouth Sudan refugee crisis

participating-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

organisation.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)

mailing-address.narrative: 19 Avenue de la paix, 1202 Geneva, Switzerland
